page.title: 07House Types.
page.content: Yesterday afternoon all our class drew the types of houses that you would find in our area.The types were as follows:Bungalows-Detached-Semi Detached-Flats-Terraced-Cottage. We then conducted a survey of the house types that the children lived in from our class.The result was as follows:Bungalow 1 child. Detached 3 children. Semi Detached 13 children. Flats 1 child Terraced 10 children. Cottages 0 children. This seems to give a fairly accurate view of the house types to be found in our block.There are mostly semi-detached houses and terraced houses.The terraced houses are the oldest types next to the cottages.They are built out of Pennant Sandstone which was quarried locally.
